article_node.title: Oman's investment sector drives regional growth and economic diversification
article_node.summary: Oman’s investment sector is becoming a key driver of economic diversification under Vision 2040, supported by fiscal reforms that cut public debt from 70% of GDP to under 34% and restored investment‑grade status. The new Growth Perspectives video by Oxford Business Group and Ominvest highlights the country’s shift away from hydrocarbons toward tourism, logistics, mining, fisheries and green hydrogen, while expanding investment in regional markets such as Saudi Arabia and the UAE. Ominvest’s strategy of cross‑border partnerships, sustainable governance and innovation is positioned to catalyze private sector growth and deepen Gulf regional integration.
